descr: "A specific set of Roles/Locations/specialties/services that a practitioner may perform at an organization for a period of time."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a PractitionerRole resource"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "Business Identifiers that are specific to a role/location."

fields.name: active
fields.descr: "Whether this practitioner's record is in active use."

fields.name: period
fields.descr: "The period during which the person is authorized to act as a practitioner in these role(s) for the organization."

fields.name: practitioner
fields.descr: "Practitioner that is able to provide the defined services for the organation."

fields.name: organization
fields.descr: "The organization where the Practitioner performs the roles associated."

fields.name: code
fields.descr: "Roles which this practitioner is authorized to perform for the organization."

fields.name: specialty
fields.descr: "Specific specialty of the practitioner."

fields.name: location
fields.descr: "The location(s) at which this practitioner provides care."

fields.name: healthcareService
fields.descr: "The list of healthcare services that this worker provides for this role's Organization/Location(s)."

fields.name: telecom
fields.descr: "Contact details that are specific to the role/location/service."

fields.name: availableTime
fields.descr: "A collection of times that the Service Site is available."

fields.name: notAvailable
fields.descr: "The HealthcareService is not available during this period of time due to the provided reason."

fields.name: availabilityExceptions
fields.descr: "A description of site availability exceptions, e.g. public holiday availability. Succinctly describing all possible exceptions to normal site availability as details in the available Times and not available Times."

fields.name: endpoint
fields.descr: "Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the practitioner with this role."

fields.name: text
fields.descr:
"A human-readable narrative that contains a summary of the resource, and may be used to represent the content of the resource to a human. The narrative need not encode all the structured data, but is required to contain sufficient detail to make it \"clinically safe\" for a human to just read the narrative. Resource definitions may define what content should be represented in the narrative to ensure clinical safety."
